```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Conditional-visibility helpers (fallback for older package versions)
if (!exists('show_when_open', mode = 'function')) {
  show_when_open  <- function(j) cat(paste0('<div class="viz-show-when" data-show-when=\'', j, '\'>\n'))
  show_when_close <- function()  cat('</div>\n')
}

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_large_27216obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

### S6: Show_when on chart itself


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_open('{"var":"view_mode","op":"eq","val":"Chart"}')
```

<div id='s6_dynamic_chart' class='pw-dynamic-text'>Chart view is active.</div>

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_close()
```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_open('{"var":"view_mode","op":"eq","val":"Summary"}')
```

<div id='s6_dynamic_summary' class='pw-dynamic-text'>Summary view is active.</div>

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_close()
```


### Row

#### Region by education (chart view)

```{r bar-region-education-2}
#| results: 'asis'
# Region by education (chart view)
show_when_open('{"var":"view_mode","op":"eq","val":"Chart"}')
result <- viz_bar(
  data = data,
  title = "Region by education (chart view)",
  color_palette = c("#4E79A7", "#59A14F", "#F28E2B", "#E15759"),
  weight_var = NULL,
  x_var = "region",
  group_var = "education"
)

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
show_when_close()
```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_open('{"var":"view_mode","op":"eq","val":"Summary"}')
```
